title: I would like to count the number of people in each area on the map.

comments.content:
Please do not use JIRA for questions. Head over to the solr-user mailing list (http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc) and ask there. Only if you find a bug or have a feature request should you open a JIRA.

Closing as "Invalid"
comments.author: Jan Høydahl
